Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Alternaria brassicola (MIC=6 µg/ml), Ascochyta pisi (MIC=6 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=2 µg/ml), Cercospora beticola (MIC=2 µg/ml), Colletotrichum lindemuthianum (MIC=1 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=3 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.pisi (MIC=5 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.lycopersici (MIC=10 µg/ml), Nectria haematococca (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Phoma betae (MIC=6 µg/ml), Pyrenophora tritici-repentis (MIC=20 µg/ml), Pyricularia oryzae (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Rhizoctonia solani (MIC=15 µg/ml), Verticillium dahliae (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Venturia inequalis (MIC=1 µg/ml).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (MIC=2 µg/ml), Sarcina lutea (MIC=50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.N-terminal Modification: Cyclization of a N-terminal Cys residue (forming a disulfide bond)
Sequence Information.Function: Possesses antifungal activity and is also active on two tested Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of a novel class of plant antimicrobial peptides form Mirabilis jalapa L. seeds.
Literature.Author: Cammue BP, De Bolle MF, Terras FR, Proost P, Van Damme J, Rees SB, Vanderleyden J, Broekaert WF.

Literature.Author: De Bolle MF, Eggermont K, Duncan RE, Osborn RW, Terras FR, Broekaert WF.
